stimulusHtml: Two wave pulses on a string approach each other and briefly overlap, resulting in the superposition of the wave pulses with a greater amplitude than either amplitude of the two individual pulses. Which of the following claims about the behavior of the wave pulses must be true?
choicesHtml: The two wave pulses exhibited constructive interference.
The two wave pulses exhibited destructive interference.
The two wave pulses created beats.
The two wave pulses produced a standing wave.
